### mount(element, containerId, options) -> `Promise`

Mount element on DOM

| Param | Type | Description |
| ----- | --- | -------- |
| element | * | React element |
| containerId | string | Id of container dom |
| options | object | Optional settings |

| Param | Type | Description |
| ----- | --- | -------- |
| options | Object | Optional settings |
